sentences.en: Sagan is more concerned with those who believe in ghosts, creationism and other phenomena that contradict the scientific worldview.
sentences.cn: 萨根更关心那些相信鬼魂、神创论和其他与科学世界观相悖的现象的人。

sentences.en: This theory is not the same as creationism.
sentences.cn: 由此可知，智能设计论与创造论并不相同。

sentences.en: 2004 study showed that 51% of Americans believed in Creationism.
sentences.cn: 2004年的一个研究发现，51%的美国人相信神创论。
